============================================
RENDER ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES FOR HDFC PAYMENT
============================================

Add these environment variables to your Render dashboard:
Render Dashboard -> Your Backend Service -> Environment -> Add Environment Variables

============================================

HDFC_MERCHANT_ID=SG4019

HDFC_KEY_UUID=key_50f19204cb4c4167a404f681545b881e

HDFC_BASE_URL=https://smartgateway.hdfcuat.bank.in

# IMPORTANT: Return URL now points to backend endpoint (handles POST from HDFC)
HDFC_RETURN_URL=https://shipsarthi.onrender.com/api/billing/wallet/payment-return

HDFC_PAYMENT_PAGE_CLIENT_ID=hdfcmaster

HDFC_PRIVATE_

HDFC_PUBLIC_

============================================
INSTRUCTIONS:
============================================

1. Go to https://dashboard.render.com
2. Select your backend service (shipsarthi)
3. Click on "Environment" tab
4. Click "Add Environment Variable" for each variable above
5. Copy the variable name and value exactly as shown
6. Click "Save Changes"
7. Render will automatically redeploy with the new variables

IMPORTANT CHANGE:
- HDFC_RETURN_URL now points to the BACKEND endpoint
- The backend handles the POST from HDFC and redirects to frontend
- This fixes the HTTP 405 error on return

After adding these variables, the wallet recharge payment should work.
